text: Matli railway station (, ) is situated at Matli which is a town and capital place of Matli Taluka in Badin District in the Sindh province of Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations on Hyderabad–Badin Branch Line Category:Railway stations in Sindh
title: Matli railway station
